job.command:
echo User code starting at date
set OUTDIR=/star/institutions/anl/sgliske/data/EEmcTrees/2006.Feb21
set IDNUM=`echo $JOBID | sed 's/[0-9A-Z]*_//'` set RUN=&RUN;-$IDNUM
# Note: StMuChainMaker complains if list does not end in .lis cp $FILELIST runfiles.lis
echo Number of files in &RUN; is wc -l runfiles.lis
ls -la set FILE1=run${RUN}.EEmcTree_Part1.trig-&TRIGVER;.root
if ( ! -e $OUTDIR/$FILE1 ) then # Make Part 1 echo root4star -b -q makeEEmcTreePart1.C\(-1,-1,\"runfiles.lis\",\"$FILE1\",1000,\'&TRIGVER;\',\"./\"\) time root4star -b -q makeEEmcTreePart1.C\(-1,-1,\"runfiles.lis\",\"$FILE1\",1000,\'&TRIGVER;\',\"./\"\) | \ egrep -v '(Number\ of|Invariant|Events\ seen|Events\ accepted|Processing\ time\ |Energy\ of\ L|-----------------------------------------------)'
echo cp $FILE1 $OUTDIR/. cp $FILE1 $OUTDIR/. endif
echo All done at date ls -lh
